main-page.description: You can sign a document with other counterparties and time stamp it on the blockchain and further confirm the authenticity of the document and signatures

doc-verification-form.message-instead-timestamp: The document has not been signed yet
doc-verification-form.sign-success-message: You have successfully signed the document

file-field.title: Select a file or drag and drop here
file-field.require: JPG, PNG or PDF, file size no more than 10MB
file-field.label: Select file

validations.field-error_email: Field must be a valid email

errors.provider-unauthorized: The requested method and/or account has not been authorized by the user.
errors.provider-unsupported-method: The Provider does not support the requested method.
errors.provider-disconnected: The Provider is disconnected from all chains.
errors.provider-chain-disconnected: The Provider is not connected to the requested chain.
errors.provider-invalid-request: JSON is not a valid request object standard
errors.provider-json-rpc-version-not-supported: Version of JSON-RPC protocol is not supported non-standard
errors.provider-wrapper-method-not-found: provider not exist or hasn't this method

notification.default-message-warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
notification.default-message-info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that
